fields.name: Commercial_Lease_Reference_Sheet_Heading
fields.fieldText: COMMERCIAL LEASE REFERENCE SHEET

validationRule.errorMessage: Expiry Date cannot be in the Past

fields.name: noteBold
fields.fieldText:
MENA REAL ESTATE SOLUTION LLC ON BEHALF OF THE LANDLORD RESERVE THE RIGHT TO UNDERTAKE CREDIT REFERENCE CHECK ON THIS APPLICATION

NOTE: APPLICANT TO ATTACH A COPY OF TRADE LICENSE AND OWNERS PASSPORT/VISA COPIES.

fields.name: note
fields.fieldText: I/We certify that the information provided in this application to lease is true and correct to the best of my knowledge. I/we hereby accept to pay a leasing fee as agreed with Mena Real Estate Solution LLC in order to secure the premises to lease. I/We agree that by signing this reference sheet, I/we confirm that it is my intention to sign a lease agreement for the mentioned property and any booking or security deposit paid by me/us will be adjusted to rent/security deposit upon signing the lease agreement. I/We agree that this booking/security deposit will be non-refundable should I/we choose to cancel this confirmed booking. Without prejudice, the Landlord is in no way obliged to accept the application to lease. No explanation will be given. Also, I/We confirm that my rent payments will be made from a local UAE bank branch and that NO payments will be made from an account where there are sanctions to that Country.

fields.name: Verified_and_approved_by_Property_Manager_Date
fields.fieldText: Verified and approved by Property Manager Date

fields.name: date_format_text
fields.fieldText: All Dates to be in DD MM YYYY format.

value.stringValue: SELECT ECSS_Expiry_Date__c, ECSS_Expiry_Date_Required__c, ECSS_SubType__c,ECSS_PublicLink__C,ECSS_Required__c,Status__c,DocumentType__c FROM Document__c WHERE Opportunity__c =: oppID AND (Status__c = 'pending' OR Status__c ='Invalid Document')

screens.name: ECSS_Upload_Opportunity_Document_Security_Cheque
screens.label: ECSS Upload Opportunity Document - Security Cheque

value.stringValue: SELECT ECSS_Expiry_Date__c, ECSS_Expiry_Date_Required__c, ECSS_SubType__c,ECSS_PublicLink__C,ECSS_Required__c,Status__c,DocumentType__c FROM Document__c WHERE Opportunity__c =: oppID AND (Status__c = 'pending' OR Status__c ='Invalid Document')

fields.name: OccupantInfo
fields.fieldText:
First Name: {!Loop_Co_Occupants.CoOccupantFullName.firstName}

Last Name: {!Loop_Co_Occupants.CoOccupantFullName.lastName}

Relationship with Tenant: {!Loop_Co_Occupants.Relationship_with_Tenant}

Email:{!Loop_Co_Occupants.OccupantEmail.value}

Date of Birth: {!Loop_Co_Occupants.Occupant_Date_of_Birth}

Asset: {!Loop_on_QLIs.Asset__r.ExternalIdentifier}

fields.name: InfoMessage
fields.fieldText: Please Enter a Valid National Id

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid 15-digit Emirates ID in the correct format.

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Please Enter Either the National Id or the Passport Number

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid 15-digit Emirates ID in the correct format.

I/we hereby accept to pay a leasing fee as agreed with Mena Real Estate Solution LLC in order to secure the premises to lease. I/We agree that by signing this reference sheet, I/we confirm that it is my intention to sign a lease agreement for the mentioned property and any booking or security deposit paid by me/us will be adjusted to rent/security deposit upon signing the lease agreement. I/We agree that this booking/security deposit will be non-refundable should I/we choose to cancel this confirmed booking. Without prejudice, the Landlord is in no way obliged to accept the application to lease. No explanation will be given. Also, I/We confirm that my rent payments will be made from a local UAE bank branch and that NO payments will be made from an account where there are sanctions to that Country.
